name: part_015
file: tmp_【#ひろがるホロライブDAY2】hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade hololive stage DAY2【チラ見せ】 [lZGqBUSvF4s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_015.mov

scenes.description: Nakiri Ayame performs the song 'Kawa-yo' on stage.
Transition between performances with stage effects and light sticks.
Natsuiro Matsuri performs her new song 'Zettai Ose!! Annibal' for the first time.

subtitles.original: やめかけたら立ち止まれ
subtitles.english: If you're about to quit, stop right there

subtitles.original: 本日もお仕事が終わりましょう
subtitles.english: Today's work is coming to an end

subtitles.original: でもな 自分のペースでまったりもしたいしな
subtitles.english: But you know, I also want to relax at my own pace

subtitles.original: どっちどっちどっち
subtitles.english: Which one, which one, which one?

subtitles.original: どっちどっちどっち
subtitles.english: Which one, which one, which one?

subtitles.original: どっちどっちどっち
subtitles.english: Which one, which one, which one?

subtitles.original: どっちどっちどっち
subtitles.english: Which one, which one, which one?

subtitles.original: どっちどっちどっち
subtitles.english: Which one, which one, which one?

subtitles.original: 今どっちのきみも大優勝
subtitles.english: Right now, either version of you is the grand champion

subtitles.original: だってこの世はめちゃかわよ
subtitles.english: Because this world is super cute

subtitles.original: ダメな時もいい時も
subtitles.english: In bad times and in good times

subtitles.original: どっちもあるから愛に気づく
subtitles.english: It's because of both that we notice love

subtitles.original: だいたいだいたい好きな結果
subtitles.english: Mostly, mostly, it's a result I like

subtitles.original: ちょっとグダグダな足取りも
subtitles.english: Even with a slightly stumbling gait

subtitles.original: うまくいかない一日も
subtitles.english: And even on days when nothing goes right

subtitles.original: 生きてるだけでかわなのだ
subtitles.english: Just being alive is cute

subtitles.original: 手を顔の上に顔をさくらんぼ
subtitles.english: Hands on the face, face like a cherry

subtitles.original: だってこの世は鬼かわよ
subtitles.english: Because this world is devilishly cute

subtitles.original: 完璧なところこそかわよ
subtitles.english: Even the perfect parts are cute

subtitles.original: 出会ってくれてありがとね
subtitles.english: Thank you for meeting me

subtitles.original: みんなだいだいだいだい好きで
subtitles.english: I love you all so, so, so much

subtitles.original: ねぇねぇもっともっと世はかわよ
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, the world is more and more cute

subtitles.original: 出会いまくれたきみとかわよ
subtitles.english: You, whom I've met so many times, are cute

subtitles.original: ラブってる日々はラブラブなのです
subtitles.english: The days we're in love are lovey-dovey

subtitles.original: 騙さずにかわなよ 生きましょ
subtitles.english: Without deception, let's live cutely

subtitles.original: あんまり振り回しすぎたら
subtitles.english: If I mess around too much

subtitles.original: もしかして呆れられちゃうかも
subtitles.english: Maybe you'll get fed up with me

subtitles.original: 懲りずにね 愛してほしいな
subtitles.english: Without giving up on me, I want you to love me

subtitles.original: そんな言葉も言えないし
subtitles.english: But I can't even say those words

subtitles.original: いつも器用にできないけど
subtitles.english: I'm not always good at things

subtitles.original: いつだってきみが笑えるように
subtitles.english: But so that you can always smile

subtitles.original: 頑張るので愛してほしいな
subtitles.english: I'll do my best, so please love me

subtitles.original: そんなところもかわよ
subtitles.english: Even that part of me is cute

subtitles.original: だって世界がかわよ
subtitles.english: Because the world is cute

subtitles.original: 今もここらへんがかわよ
subtitles.english: Even right now, this is cute

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: 絶対御世！！Annibal
subtitles.english: Zettai Ose!! Annibal

subtitles.original: うおー！新曲お披露目だ！
subtitles.english: Whoa! It's a new song reveal!

subtitles.original: 超いい曲だから最後まできいてね！
subtitles.english: It's a super good song, so listen until the end!

subtitles.original: 行くよ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 約束その一
subtitles.english: Promise number one

subtitles.original: 私以外の女とは目を合わせないこと
subtitles.english: Don't make eye contact with any woman other than me

subtitles.original: 約束その二
subtitles.english: Promise number two

subtitles.original: 破った場合 退所は考えないものとします
subtitles.english: If broken, withdrawal will not be considered

subtitles.original: 本心なんて曖昧だね
subtitles.english: True feelings are so ambiguous

subtitles.original: 独占禁止法だ
subtitles.english: It's an Anti-Monopoly Law

subtitles.original: 束縛だって泣いちゃうくらい
subtitles.english: Restraint to the point of crying

subtitles.original: 絶対絶対絶対絶対だめ
subtitles.english: Is absolutely, absolutely, absolutely, absolutely forbidden

subtitles.original: ふらふら浮つく人には
subtitles.english: To those who are fickle and unfaithful

subtitles.original: 条件なんてあげないないない
subtitles.english: I won't give any terms at all

subtitles.original: やっぱり目移りです
subtitles.english: As expected, your eyes are wandering

subtitles.original: 絶対御世 初めまして
subtitles.english: Absolute Era, nice to meet you

subtitles.original: 休み時間 一息ももし
subtitles.english: Recess, if even for a breath

subtitles.original: 退けないよ 乱雑だわ
subtitles.english: I can't back down, it's messy

subtitles.original: このまま立ってファウファあれ
subtitles.english: Just stand there like that, fanfare

subtitles.original: もんたいにばる
subtitles.english: Montai-nival

subtitles.original: 私だけの特権 I want you
subtitles.english: My exclusive privilege, I want you

subtitles.original: 絶対御世！！Annibal
subtitles.english: Zettai Ose!! Annibal

subtitles.original: 約束その三
subtitles.english: Promise number three

subtitles.original: 他の女に可愛いって言わないこと
subtitles.english: Don't say "cute" to other women

subtitles.original: 約束その四
subtitles.english: Promise number four

subtitles.original: 破ったら 針千本飲まーす 私釘付けの刑
subtitles.english: If broken, I'll make you swallow a thousand needles, sentence you to be fixed on me

subtitles.original: 崇拝だって純愛さ
subtitles.english: Even worship is pure love

subtitles.original: 革命前夜ファンファーレ
subtitles.english: The fanfare on the eve of the revolution

subtitles.original: 王国だって変えちゃう未来
subtitles.english: A future that could even change a kingdom

subtitles.original: 絶対絶対絶対絶対強制
subtitles.english: Is absolutely, absolutely, absolutely, absolutely mandatory

subtitles.original: よりどりみどりね 素敵よね
subtitles.english: A wide variety, isn't it wonderful?

subtitles.original: おぼこ様
subtitles.english: My innocent darling

subtitles.original: 進行方向 知らないないない
subtitles.english: Direction of progress, I don't know at all

subtitles.original: だけどヤキモキです
subtitles.english: But I'm feeling anxious

subtitles.original: 絶対御世 始めちゃうわ
subtitles.english: I'm starting the Absolute Era

subtitles.original: きみを狙ってひっきりなし
subtitles.english: Aiming for you incessantly

subtitles.original: 一般教養 恋を先生
subtitles.english: General education, love as the teacher

subtitles.original: パーティー開きたくまつりごと
subtitles.english: I want to hold a party, a festive matter

subtitles.original: 二人調べも不思議人モンチュー
subtitles.english: Checking the two of us, a mysterious person Mon-chu

subtitles.original: 絶対御世！！Annibal
subtitles.english: Zettai Ose!! Annibal

subtitles.original: まずいぞ！恋一番可愛いのはだーれ？
subtitles.english: This is bad! Who is the cutest in love?

subtitles.original: まつりー！
subtitles.english: Matsuri-!

subtitles.original: ひひー！よーし！
subtitles.english: Hee-hee! Alright!

subtitles.original: ナイスだぞ！
subtitles.english: Nice one!

subtitles.original: ねえ こんなこと
subtitles.english: Hey, things like this

subtitles.original: 言いたくないよ 本当は
subtitles.english: I don't really want to say them

subtitles.original: だけど本気で
subtitles.english: But seriously

subtitles.original: 伝えておけばよかったなってさ
subtitles.english: I wish I had told you

subtitles.original: 後悔したくないのね
subtitles.english: I don't want to regret it

subtitles.original: 好きなのよね
subtitles.english: Because I love you, you know?

subtitles.original: わかって？これも愛
subtitles.english: Understand? This is also love

subtitles.original: 絶対御世 初めまして
subtitles.english: Absolute Era, nice to meet you

subtitles.original: 休み時間 一息ももし
subtitles.english: Recess, if even for a breath

subtitles.original: 退けないよ 乱雑だわ
subtitles.english: I can't back down, it's messy

subtitles.original: このまま立ってファウファあれ
subtitles.english: Just stand there like that, fanfare

subtitles.original: 私だけの特権 I want you
subtitles.english: My exclusive privilege, I want you
